title: Hour 1: Kevin Sent
description:
In this episode, Freddie Coleman, Courtney Cronin, and Brian Windhorst react to Kevin Durant's request for a trade from the Brooklyn Nets; debating his best landing spots around the league and where this leaves Kyrie Irving. After the addition of Jalen Brunson to the New York Knicks, the crew answers the burning question: Are the Knicks a playoff team? Also, Paul Finebaum joins the show to discuss what the college football landscape will look like as USC and UCLA make the move from the PAC-12 to the Big Ten in 2024 and what it means for The Fighting Irish.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Do you blame Durant for wanting out of Brooklyn?
